cameraFocusHelperList.name: Sapper Alpha Start Area Cam Target
Sapper Bravo Start Area Cam Target

contractObjectiveList.title: Escort combat engineers to collapse the tunnels
Hold out against waves of attackers

dialogueContent.words: The Agressors have been going after fuel processors and refineries throughout the badlands, Commander. The fission plants that power our cities rely on the materials that are produced and refined here—uranium, deuterium for heavy water, you name it.

Your main objective is the defense of the facility's primary refinery. If the Agressors manage to destroy it, it's only a matter of time before Itrom's entire power grid goes down. And if that happens, people will die.
Long-range scans provided to us by our contractor shows Agressor forces converging on this location along three separate vectors.
One group is moving along the main approach…
…And two more are coming in through these tunnels, labeled Alpha…

…And Bravo. Collapsing the tunnels will force them to backtrack out of the mountain passes and use the main approach instead. This will give you an advantage in positioning, and will buy you valuable time.

Our friends provided by our contractor have provided us with combat engineers to collapse the passes, but Taurian units in the area will destroy them if they get the chance. Go in with guns blazing and attract their attention. Any enemies that you fail to engage will make short work of our engineers.
Well done, Commander! You've driven the Agressors away and prevented the collapse of Itrom's power grid.
And you've walked even more radioactive sand into the Leopard's Mech Bay. [sigh] C'mon, Commander… let's get you home.
I'll leave you to it, Commander. Show the Agressors that we protect the people—no matter what.
While the Agressors won't suffer the same communications or sensory difficulties that the Directorate did, we still have the environment of the badlands working in our favor.

There are many hazards out here that can damage a BattleMech: radioactive sandstorms, corrosive vapors, rivers of hydrofluoric acid… and over the course of their campaign, the Taurians have been exposed to them all.

Any Agressor 'Mech that you encounter are likely to enter battle in a damaged state. If our sappers do their jobs and collapse the tunnels, those that are forced to reroute will be even worse for wear.
They've pushed their luck by staying in the badlands too long. Make them understand the severity of their mistake.
Sappers are outbound for Tunnel Alpha, Commander. Keep the bad guys off of us, and we'll do our part.
Transport waypoint data uploaded.
Sappers outbound for Tunnel Bravo. You get us there in one piece, and we'll blow that tunnel to hell.
Transport waypoint data uploaded.
Sapper Alpha reporting in. I am halfway to my destination and moving at full throttle.
Don't let them get ahead of you, Commander—keep that vehicle protected!
This is Sapper Bravo. I'm halfway to my objective and movin' fast!
Keep on that vehicle, Commander. They won't stand a chance without your protection.
This is Sapper Alpha. I'm making my final approach.
Sapper Bravo here. I'm heading into the pass.
Here they come! You've got Agressor BattleMechs on the main approach!
To the refinery! Go! Raze it to the ground and leave nothing standing!
Tunnel Alpha is toast, Commander.
Tunnel Bravo has been collapsed! Ain't nothin' coming through here anytime soon!
We've got multiple hostiles inbound! Take up defensive positions and protect that refinery!
Hostiles on the main approach, Commander.
To the refinery! Go! Raze it to the ground and leave nothing standing!
Hostiles incoming through Tunnel Alpha! Take them out!
Hostiles incoming through a side canyon! Looks like they had to backtrack from Tunnel Alpha… they're looking pretty chewed up.
We've got hostiles inbound, coming through Tunnel Bravo! Go get them!
I'm seeing Agressor units coming in through a side canyon. They look damaged… the trip back from what's left of Tunnel Bravo seems to have taken its toll.
That's both passes blocked! Nicely done, Commander—you've derailed their attack plan. Now go capitalize on it!

longDescription: Proceed to Itrom to protect its people from the aggressors. The latest intel recommends a lance that balances speed and firepower, but can deal with Itrom’s searing heat. Further details will be provided upon your arrival.

objectiveList.title: Protect Sappers En Route to Pass Alpha
Protect Sappers En Route to Pass Bravo
Hidden Main Alpha Lance Spawn Timer
Hidden Main Bravo Lance Spawn Timer

shortDescription: This planet has been under seige for a while. They are looking for some Mercs to protect the people from the aggressors.
